alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Daviess; DeKalb; Grundy (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 10:28PM CDT until August 11 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Daviess County in north central Missouri... Southwestern Grundy County in north central Missouri... North central Caldwell County in north central Missouri... Northeastern DeKalb County in northwestern Missouri... * Until 1115 PM CDT. * At 1027 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Pattonsburg, or 11 miles northwest of Gallatin, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gallatin, Jamesport, Pattonsburg, Altamont, Coffey, Jameson and Santa Rosa. This includes Interstate 35 in Missouri between mile markers 66 and 82. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
